```{r, include=FALSE}
library(freewall)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
imagesFolder <- "images"
imgs <- paste0(imagesFolder, "/", list.files(imagesFolder))
freewall(
  imgs, 
  widths = 150,
  width = "80%",
  cellW = 150,
  cellH = "auto",
  draggable = TRUE
)
```
